ðŸŽ€ Care Instruction:
We recommend hand wash your pants and line dry. Do not soak in the water for long periods. It is natural for these vibrant patterns to have a little color come out for the first few times when you wash them. After that you will be able to mix with other clothes without any issue. You can also wash these separately in the washer on a delicate cycle. We recommend you put them in a garment bag to protect the feel and elasticity of the pants

ðŸ‘–Your Harem Pants
Loose and supremely comfortable Harem Pants. They are unisex and have both an elastic waist and ankles for a flexible fit. Standard one size fits most (US size 0-16 or XS-L). Our harem pants are handmade with lightweight 100% rayon that is extremely breathable and flowy. These pants are great for exercise, yoga, taking a walk in nature or the beach, festivals, family get together, or just relaxing at your home.
